description: Arrange cocktail franks, bread rolls, cabanossi skewers and prosciutto-wrapped asparagus on a board for a scrumptious savoury grazing platter like no other.
name: Cocktail Franks Grazing Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Primo cabanossi sticks, cut diagonally into 1cm slices

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange cocktail franks, tomato sauce, mustard, pickled onion, buns and remaining sliced cabanossi on a serving board. Add asparagus and cabanossi skewers. Sprinkle with basil leaves. Serve.
